headers.value: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' https://connect.facebook.net 'unsafe-inline'; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://fonts.googleapis.com https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com; font-src 'self' https://fonts.gstatic.com; connect-src 'self' https://connect.facebook.net https://www.facebook.com; object-src 'none'; base-uri 'self'; frame-ancestors 'none';
